mapper.select: SELECT C.*, BRAND, CLOTHES_NAME, PRICE, CATEGORY, DISCOUNT_RATE FROM (SELECT SHOPPINGCART_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_COUNT, DATE, B.* FROM SHOPPINGCART A JOIN USER B ON A.UID = B.UID AND A.UID=#{UID} ) AS C JOIN product AS D ON C.PRODUCT_ID = D.PRODUCT_ID ;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT C.*, BRAND, CLOTHES_NAME, PRICE, CATEGORY, DISCOUNT_RATE FROM (SELECT SHOPPINGCART_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_COUNT, DATE, B.* FROM SHOPPINGCART A JOIN USER B ON A.UID = B.UID AND A.UID=#{UID} ) AS C JOIN PRODUCT AS D ON C.PRODUCT_ID = D.PRODUCT_ID) AS SHOPPINGCARTINFO JOIN CIP_ATTACHFILE AS FILE ON SHOPPINGCARTINFO.PRODUCT_ID = FILE.SOURCE_UNIQUE_SEQ -- AND SHOPPINGCARTINFO.PRODUCT_ID = 'PROD_1' GROUP BY SOURCE_UNIQUE_SEQ ORDER BY DATE ;
